item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Here's Our Weekend Strategy - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Here's Our Weekend Strategy - NEWSBTC

Here's what we are looking at for the weekend sessions in the bitcoin price So that's it - the end of the week. We've had some considerable up and down swings in the bitcoin price since Monday, and as we mentioned in the first of our twice daily bitcoin price watch pieces this morning, we've been able to get in and out for a profit on a couple of occasions.

item.title: Scientific Research Needs a Trustless Blockchain Architecture to Be Trusted
item.description:
Scientific Research Needs a Trustless Blockchain Architecture to Be Trusted

Dr. Greg Irving, a Clinical Lecturer from the University of Cambridge, recently authored a research project on the potential impact of blockchain technology on scientific research. While the use is not novel in principle, it underscores the very reason blockchain was created.

item.title: Microsoft Joins Blockchain-Focused Chamber of Digital Commerce
item.description:
Microsoft Joins Blockchain-Focused Chamber of Digital Commerce

Microsoft has joined the Chamber of Digital Commerce. What difference would this bring to blockchain adoption? Recently Microsoft has announced that it has joined the Chamber of Digital Commerce, a trade association focused on promoting distributed ledger technology. What difference would this bring to blockchain adoption?

item.title: Japan's TechBureau Raises $6.5 Million for Bitcoin and Blockchain Services - CoinDesk
item.description:
Japan's TechBureau Raises $6.5 Million for Bitcoin and Blockchain Services - CoinDesk

A Japanese blockchain startup has raised Â¥720m (or just over $6.5m) in a new Series A funding round. TechBureau, which operates a bitcoin exchange called Zaif and a permissioned blockchain platform named Mijin, netted the investment from a group of investors.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Range-Bound
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Range-Bound

Bitcoin price has spent the day above $450 (Bitstamp) but the market has not made progress either way. We take a look at the most significant boundaries for this years price action - and the levels that will confirm that a trending move has broken out.

item.title: Ethereum Technical Analysis for 05/13/2016 - Major Resistance at 0.024
item.description:
Ethereum Technical Analysis for 05/13/2016 - Major Resistance at 0.024

Today, the ETH exchange is hovering above 0.023 for the first time since the beginning of April. In the past two months, the 0.023 pivot zone prevented the market from breaking out on multiple occasions; three times to be more exact.

item.title: Claims of Quantum Computing Bitcoin Mining Through Coinfac Debunked
item.description:
Claims of Quantum Computing Bitcoin Mining Through Coinfac Debunked

Throughout the past few months, here has been a lot of talk about Bitcoin and quantum computing. Coinfac, a company, based in Hong Kong - allegedly owned by Palantir Technologies - wants to use quantum computing for Bitcoin mining.

item.description:

The casino exclusively accepts Bitcoin, Litecoin, Darkcoin, Namecoin, Clams, Dogecoin, Peercoin, Novacoin, and Reddcoin. FortuneJack is one of the most popular online Bitcoin Casinos in the Industry. item.title: A Bitcoin Chat With CoinCorner CTO Danny Scott
item.description:
A Bitcoin Chat With CoinCorner CTO Danny Scott

CoinCorner recently became one of the first Designated Business title holders in The Isle of Man. As the Bitcoin company is now officially compliant with regulation, the time has come to look at what users can expect in the future.

item.title: Two Peas In A Pod: Bitcoin and Prague
item.description:
Two Peas In A Pod: Bitcoin and Prague

What Bitcoin represents to me is far more than just a digital currency. By combining technology, a global reach, and a clear, unyielding vision to improve lives, Bitcoin allows for a truly digital and convenient way to transact.
